snippet.title: Station 5 for the Apple II
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

---


Game desceription:

Help your robot(s) to keep Station 5 alright.

The game offers a lot of variety. While you have to refill power in one level, in another level you have to shut down hostile towers, just to give you some examples.


What I think:

Quite fun game and nice variety.

Not an easy game though.
